text.tspan: Develop an interactive tutor moderated chat system for automated analysis and dynamic support for an online
collaborative learning process. Proposed and implemented 2
pass architecture model for modelling the studentsâ€™
conversation and building an agent pr
ototype capable of detecting distraction/ confusion among students and provide
necessary support to ensure effective learning.
Summer Undergraduate Research Grant for Excellence
Developed efficient algorithms for projecting the point cloud on the projection surface.
